#include <iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,m;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
	    cin>>n;
	    m=n;
	    int sum=0;
	    while(n>0){
	        sum+=n%10;
	        n=n/10;
	    }
	    int mul;
	    mul=m*pow(2,sum);
	    cout<<mul<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
